responseText: The heartwood of Verra bound all of the great settlements of the Exalted together. There were speculations that the roots of the great trees wound into a knotwork somewhere deep in the center of all Verra. The one here at Aela has died, though, all we see now is her husk. One day, even that will fall into the sea and be lost. Sad, huh?
name: SQ_Lionhold_0002_Fragments_Carole_7_Response
